SCTX:
Begin forcefieldScript

float timer
float goAway

if ( goAway == 0 )
	if ( GetJournalIndex BM_Draugr == 70 )
		if ( GetDistance Player <= 512 )
			set goAway to 1
		endif
	elseif ( GetJournalIndex BM_Draugr == 90 )
		if ( GetDistance Player <= 512 )
			set goAway to 1
		endif
	endif 
endif

if ( goAway == 1 )
	LoopGroup Idle2 2 1
	set goAway to 2
endif

if ( goAway == 2 )
	if ( timer < 2.5 )
		set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )
		return
	else
		Disable
		setdelete 1
		set goAway to 3
	endif
endif	






End forcefieldScript
